content: I noticed that Quarkus has a dev stream rather than a bunch of streams (auth, file handling, export, ingest, etc.) Would that make sense for us? A #dev stream?
Probably. Less clutter about dev topics between people asking for help
Ok. Right now I have containers on the brain so I'll use #containers . But when we need it, maybe we'll add #dev. :happy:

We now have a #troubleshooting stream, as mentioned here: https://dataverse.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/375876-zulip/topic/.E2.9C.94.20issues.20stream/near/343779350

I think we'll still want a #dev stream eventually, but no rush.
@Jan Range has a dev thing he wants to post. I went ahead and created a #dev stream: https://dataverse.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/379673-dev
Philip Durbin has marked this topic as resolved.
